title: Pause a Subscription
description: Instead of canceling, a customer wants to pause their monthly subscription for three months while they are on vacation.

tasks.description: Update the subscription status to 'Paused' and set a reactivation date for three months in the future.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pauses the subscription for the specified duration.

tasks.description: Confirm with the customer the dates the subscription will be paused and when it will automatically resume.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the start and end dates of the pause.
